description: recto: red border with rounded corners; futuristic spacecraft with four pink planets; blue ground verso: landscape at bottom with houses, trees, and a rows of stick figures in silhouette at bottom center; teardrop-shaped radiating mandorla with football-shaped center; text in bubbles in sky

medium: Marker, ballpoint pen, and paint on posterboard
signed: LRC in black ink: 1980AD / VISION WINTER / PATRIARCH ROYAL ROBERTSON
title: Vision Winter
